title: Oyo to open 50 hotels in Ayodhya
description: Oyo has announced it will expand its offerings with 50 new properties in Ayodhya this year. The properties will include 25 homestays run by homeowners and 25 small and medium-sized hotels. Oyo claims its data shows hotels onboarded on the Oyo platform independent budget hotels of a similar size double their revenue within three months.
